function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor coverage in 1G technology","Impact":"Limited connectivity and communication capabilities, hindering effective use of mobile phones","Mitigation":"Improvement of infrastructure, implementation of more cell towers and network expansion","Technologies":"Improved network infrastructure, cell tower technology","People":"Mobile phone users","Owner":"Mobile network operators"},{"Description":"Low sound quality in 1G technology","Impact":"Difficulty in clear communication and understanding during phone calls","Mitigation":"Development of better voice call technology, use of digital voice calls","Technologies":"Digital voice call technology, encryption","People":"Mobile phone users","Owner":"Mobile phone manufacturers, mobile network operators"},{"Description":"Lack of roaming support capacity in 1G technology","Impact":"Limited mobility and accessibility for users in different locations","Mitigation":"Standardization of network protocol, implementation of roaming services","Technologies":"Standardized network protocol, roaming services infrastructure","People":"Mobile phone users","Owner":"Mobile network operators"}]}
